fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Set up a trap at your targetâ€™s house (1 use)
-Force someone to build a trap for you

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If your trapped target visits any player, deal a powerful attack to them and learn their role
-Anyone that visits your target gains powerful defense
-You may only have 1 trap set up at a time
-Forcing someone to rebuild a trap for you roleblocks that person and gives you another charge of your first ability
-This is mechanically a town role in every way except win condition

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have the good faction lose (May win while dead)
